ingredients: 4 long Chinese eggplants (about 1 1/2 lb total), quartered lengthwise and chopped into 2-3" strips
1/4 - 1/2 tsp szechuan peppercorns (depending on desired spiciness)
2 green onions, whites and greens chopped separately
2 Tbl broad bean paste, also known as doubanjiang
4 pickled red hot peppers, chopped into small pieces (omit if using spicy doubanjiang)
